description.h2: The xlink:arcrole attribute of a link:footnoteArc element must be defined in the XBRL Specification 2.1 or a standard taxonomy schema.
description.p: REMARK EFM v16 is wrong, the above text or a standard taxonomy schema is correct.

REMARK the arc role link:definition does not matter because the entire declaration is forbidden. Variation 001ng' schema also throws error 6.9.5 from its schema. The test of the instance remains meaningful.

variation.name: 6.5.30 Instance footnote contains a custom footnote arc role, NOGOOD
variation.description: Instance footnote contains a custom footnote arc role. NOGOOD.

variation.name: 6.5.30 Instance footnote contains a footnote arc with arcrole defined in edgartaxonomies.xml, GOOD.
variation.description: Instance footnote contains a footnote arc with arcrole defined in edgartaxonomies.xml, GOOD.
